languages.text: {n}Крик Тазарры превращается в шипение.{/n} "Я догадывалась, что ты и этот истиннорожденный ублюдок заодно. Он заставил меня и моих сестер прозябать здесь не просто так, а с какой-то целью, которая включает тебя. Да? Так ведь? Скажи мне... просто кивни, чтобы я могла обвинить его перед лицом архонта в предательстве и провале рейда!"

{n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"
languages.original_text: {n}Крик Тазарры превращается в шипение.{/n} "Я догадывалась, что ты и этот истиннорожденный ублюдок заодно. Он заставил меня и моих сестер прозябать здесь не просто так, а с какой-то целью, которая включает тебя. Да? Так ведь? Скажи мне... просто кивни, чтобы я могла обвинить его перед лицом архонта в предательстве и провале рейда!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tazarra's screaming drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur are in cahoots. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can accuse him of betrayal and compromising the raid before the Archon!"

He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

languages.text: {n}タザーラの叫びは唸り声へと変わった。{/n}「貴様はあのトゥルーボーンと野良犬と共謀している。奴は気まぐれに私や妹たちをここに引き止めたわけじゃない。奴は目的があってここにいて、その目的には貴様が関わってる。そうだろう？教えてくれ…うなずくだけでいい。そうすれば私はアーコンの前に立ち、裏切りや襲撃を許したことを堂々と非難できる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}タザーラの叫びは唸り声へと変わった。{/n}「貴様はあのトゥルーボーンと野良犬と共謀している。奴は気まぐれに私や妹たちをここに引き止めたわけじゃない。奴は目的があってここにいて、その目的には貴様が関わってる。そうだろう？教えてくれ…うなずくだけでいい。そうすれば私はアーコンの前に立ち、裏切りや襲撃を許したことを堂々と非難できる！」

languages.text: {n}塔扎菈的咆哮变成了低沉的嘶嘶声。{/n}“我猜，你和那个嫡脉的狗杂种是一伙的吧？他显然不会平白无故让我和我的姐妹们留在这里，他是有意这么做的，而且和你有关。是吧？没错吧？告诉我吧……只要点点头就好，这样我就可以站在执政官面前，告发他的背叛行为，告发他破坏了我们的劫掠！”
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}塔扎菈的咆哮变成了低沉的嘶嘶声。{/n}“我猜，你和那个嫡脉的狗杂种是一伙的吧？他显然不会平白无故让我和我的姐妹们留在这里，他是有意这么做的，而且和你有关。是吧？没错吧？告诉我吧……只要点点头就好，这样我就可以站在执政官面前，告发他的背叛行为，告发他破坏了我们的劫掠！”

languages.text: {n}El alarido de Tazarra se convierte en un siseo.{/n} «Tenía mis sospechas de que ese perro Legítimo y tú estabais colaborando. No ha hecho que mis hermanas y yo esperáramos aquí por capricho. Tenía sus razones, relacionadas contigo. ¿Sí? ¿Es así? Dímelo... ¡Solo tienes que asentir para que pueda presentarme ante la Arconte y acusarle de traición y de poner en peligro la incursión!».
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El alarido de Tazarra se convierte en un siseo.{/n} «Tenía mis sospechas de que ese perro Legítimo y tú estabais colaborando. No ha hecho que mis hermanas y yo esperáramos aquí por capricho. Tenía sus razones, relacionadas contigo. ¿Sí? ¿Es así? Dímelo... ¡Solo tienes que asentir para que pueda presentarme ante la Arconte y acusarle de traición y de poner en peligro la incursión!».

languages.text: {n}Le cri de Tazarra se transforme en feulement.{/n} « Je me doutais que vous collaboriez avec cette pourriture d'Immaculé. Il n'a pas ordonné à mes sœurs et moi de rester ici sans raison. Il avait un plan, et vous en faites partie. Alors ? C'est bien ça ? Répondez-moi... Vous pouvez simplement hocher la tête. Ça me suffira pour l'accuser devant l'archonte de trahison et d'avoir tenté de saboter ce raid ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cri de Tazarra se transforme en feulement.{/n} « Je me doutais que vous collaboriez avec cette pourriture d'Immaculé. Il n'a pas ordonné à mes sœurs et moi de rester ici sans raison. Il avait un plan, et vous en faites partie. Alors ? C'est bien ça ? Répondez-moi... Vous pouvez simplement hocher la tête. Ça me suffira pour l'accuser devant l'archonte de trahison et d'avoir tenté de saboter ce raid ! »

languages.text: {n}Tazarras Kreischen wird zu einem Zischen.{/n} "Ich hatte den Verdacht, dass Ihr und dieser fleischgeborene Hundesohn zusammenarbeitet. Er hat mich und meine Schwestern nicht aus einer Laune heraus hier versauern lassen – er hatte einen Grund, und der seid Ihr. Stimmt's? Habe ich recht? Sagt es mir ... nickt einfach, damit ich vor den Archon treten und ihn wegen Verrats anklagen und für den gescheiterten Überfall verantwortlich machen kann!"
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tazarras Kreischen wird zu einem Zischen.{/n} "Ich hatte den Verdacht, dass Ihr und dieser fleischgeborene Hundesohn zusammenarbeitet. Er hat mich und meine Schwestern nicht aus einer Laune heraus hier versauern lassen – er hatte einen Grund, und der seid Ihr. Stimmt's? Habe ich recht? Sagt es mir ... nickt einfach, damit ich vor den Archon treten und ihn wegen Verrats anklagen und für den gescheiterten Überfall verantwortlich machen kann!"

languages.text: {n}Tazarra'nın çığlığı, yerini bir tıslamaya bırakıyor.{/n} "O adi Saltdoğan'la iş tuttuğundan şüphelenmiştim zaten. Kardeşlerimi ve beni boş yere burada tutmadı. Bir sebep vardı, o sebep de seninle ilgili. Değil mi? Ha? Söyle... Söyle ki Arkon'un karşısına çıkıp onu ihanetle ve saldırıyı tehlikeye atmakla suçlayabileyim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Tazarra's shriek drops to a hiss.{/n} "I suspected that you and that Trueborn cur were working together. He did not make me and my sisters linger here on a whim — he had a reason, and that reason involves you. Yes? Is that it? Tell me... just nod, so I can stand before the Archon and accuse him of treachery and compromising the raid!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tazarra'nın çığlığı, yerini bir tıslamaya bırakıyor.{/n} "O adi Saltdoğan'la iş tuttuğundan şüphelenmiştim zaten. Kardeşlerimi ve beni boş yere burada tutmadı. Bir sebep vardı, o sebep de seninle ilgili. Değil mi? Ha? Söyle... Söyle ki Arkon'un karşısına çıkıp onu ihanetle ve saldırıyı tehlikeye atmakla suçlayabileyim!"
